mapper.insert: insert into slave_info (id, name, ip, token, status, owner, password) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{token,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{owner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update slave_info set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, token = #{token,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, owner = #{owner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, name, ip, token, status, owner, password, create_time, update_time from slave_info
